item.title: Nvidia and the U.S. Government Both Have Stakes in Intel Now
item.description: Intel stock surged after announcing a $5 billion deal with Nvidia.

item.title: 5 Brain Implant Companies Developing New Ways to Treat Disease
item.description: These pioneers are aiming to do challenging and important medical work. One has already implanted 54 patients.

item.title: Seeing Is Believing: How a Rare Surgery Can Reverse Blindness
item.description: An innovative tooth-in-eye surgery helped a patient regain his eyesight after two decades. It’s exactly what it sounds like.

item.title: What to Say to Your Kids About AI
item.description: Parents are sticking their heads in the sand about their kids’ AI use. Experts say they should experiment with AI together instead.

item.title: How Chasing Profitability Has Crippled the Tech Industry in 2025
item.description: This is largely a case of: Don’t fix the problem, just give me something new to complain about.
